text:
When Jasper 2 calls the Javac compiler to compile a JSP page, the classpath 
parameters has inside twice the path to jars on [WEBAPLICATION]/WEB-INF/lib.

Works fine, but maybe it could break some platforms if there are many jars on 
the WEB-INF/lib dir.
creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
markt@apache.org
text: *** Bug 28835 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I don't see this issue in the latest code so I can only assume it got fixed at some point - probably a while ago.
creator: markt@apache.org
